website_summaries.verdict: This machine, designed to sit on the counter, can ionize water for drinking purposes and also make it acidic for cleaning purposes.
pros: Connect it to your water line or faucet
There is a vocal indicator when filter needs changing
Owners say they can feel the health benefits
cons: Your tap or well must run at 20psi for this product to work

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Great Again!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a alkaline water machine this is the one you want to get. Me and my wife have been drinking this water over a year and feel great . would recommend this 100%.
customer_reviews.author: scott e.

customer_reviews.title: Good Water, crappy machine
customer_reviews.text: The water it produces tastes great. I haven't done an alkaline test on it yet so I can't say for sure about if it's actually producing what it says it is. However, the unit leaks like a freaking sieve. It leaks out from under the swivel on top and it leaks out the bottom as well and it's not due to a poor installation by me. I figure I can fix it so I haven't sent it back but it is disappointing as far as the quality. Update: I wish I had sent it back. Stupid thing still leaks and now I'm learning that artificially alkalized water may not be so good for you after all. Do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Greene

customer_reviews.title: I honestly really wanted to like this machine
customer_reviews.text: My problem with This machine is that it doesn’t go as Alkaline or as Acidic as it claims. Instructions for this machine is horrible. I tried to change the programmed settings, no instructions comes with the machine on how to do that, you can find some half explained instructions in the Q and A here that I tried to follow. I’m including pictures of the machine in the highest alkaline setting (9.5) as well as in the strongest acidic setting (5.0) so you can see for yourself. Also a note comes with your machine offering free filters if you leave a 5 star review. Sending my machine back and looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine . While pricey , since I've been drinking this water I have gotten off my antacids that I had been on for 8 years . After using for about two weeks , I went back to my favorite water fountain at work as I forgot my water on that day . The fountain water was undrinkable for me . I could taste the chemicals . This was well worth the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Daddyo

customer_reviews.title: DON'T FEAR THE "USED" MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: Saved a bunch buying used (demonstrator) and it came in brand-new box with two additional filters for when the "used" ones need replacing. Love the water - it's identical in taste and texture to the ionized alkaline water from the much more expensive competition. I would recommend this company and machine highly.
customer_reviews.author: MARK MIKELS

customer_reviews.title: this is an amazing machine! after reviewing several alkaline machines this one ...
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing machine! after reviewing several alkaline machines this one was definetley the best choice. ot has dual filters which most do not, its self cleaning and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: Not acidic. Barely a change.
customer_reviews.text: The water coming out is not acidic. I’ve tested it next to our other machine and this machine barely makes any change to the water. There is no bleach like smell like there is with other machines when you use acidic setting. Can not use this to clean! If you are using for a placebo then it’s perfect! Checked ph, little change.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lydick

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional water filter
customer_reviews.text: We have had our bawell for about a year now and still love it. Took about 10 min to get setup with easy to follow instructions. You can turn the talking voice off so that is good. Our overall health has been better and the normal seasonal colds have not visted our house. You can tell if you need to drink less of a high ph as sometimes foods start to taste differnt. As with everything, you can have to much of a good thing. The install booklet has recommendations for how much to drink and what the differnt ph levels are good for. Not having to buy bottled water has saved us alot of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: You don't realize how bad you felt until you start to feel good!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great pH is the water accurately it feels amazing to have such good water. You also get free replacement filters with a five star review.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Glover

customer_reviews.title: Fancy & Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I been shopping around for a good water ionizer machine for awhile. Than I saw the Bawell machine on Facebook. After several weeks of researching different brands of machine, I decide to go ahead and buy the Bawell brand. Since I never had an expensive water filter before this was a big gamble for me. After a month of usage, I really like this machine. The installment manual was easy to follow. The machine was fancy looking too. Water taste good, even my plants like it. Lol. I would recommend this machine for anyone who wants to buy a alkaline water ionizer machine.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine. The postage was very quick and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful machine. The postage was very quick and the packaging was immaculate. It was a great surprise to find extra set of filters to clean the water before it goes to the machine. Superb seller and great product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jack Vassi

customer_reviews.title: Magic water!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the machine for about a month now and it’s magic water. Helped with my m.s., diabetes, and all other things that it mentioned in reviews. Love the waters taste and the filter system it comes with is great. Use it for cooking and it adds so much flavour. I’ve been getting a lot of compliments on my skin which I never expected. If there is a complaint about the machine it’s just the water dispenser pipe on the top, very easy to pop off. Other than that the wife and I are in love with the machine and the water it produces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Functional
customer_reviews.text: If you watch the online installation video it is very helpful in guiding you in how to install the Ionizer. The water in our city pipes has lots of rust and sediments. I have used the Ionizer for close to two weeks, and it has improved the taste of my morning coffee and has encouraged me to drink more alkaline and purified water on a daily basis. I researched the features of a number of Ionizers on the market, and I believe this one provides the greatest value for the costs.
customer_reviews.author: Sethia

customer_reviews.title: A good invertment. hope get it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Very good Alkaline water ionizer machine. I use it everyday and feel much better on my daily life. Feel more energy and I sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: qwerty99q88

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up 4 Bawell
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost 2 years to write this review because I wanted to be sure because of the price of the unit. In short my family and I LOVE IT. It was a the only water we drink even though we always have bottled water for hurricanes and pets. We use Bawell water to cook , make coffee and drink. We feel healthier drinking it and have given friends water until they purchased their own. It's well made and no fuss so far. The customer service is top notch too. Can you believe they even respond to you on a Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use. Our importance in buying an ionizer was in the capabilities to produce negative ORP values, since pH is the least important factor. Using it at level 1, was producing -260 mv in ORP, but it could go all the way to -600. We really like it with the exception that had some issues due apparent power surge in our area. We want to believe that cause an issue. We shipped it back to them due the outstanding lifetime warranty, waiting for diagnostic and repair. Great customer service. Sincerely a great product, exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: oscar caven

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has changed our life! We used the acidic water to clean and the whole family drink the alkaline water on the daily basis. My boys won’t even drink bottle water Anymore which i love! Great customer support, I highly recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Clint Adam

customer_reviews.title: I was excited about this purchase. Unfortunately I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this purchase. Unfortunately I had to return it because it didn't work, even after troubleshooting it with the seller several times. The seller was very accommodating, it was just this unit that was not cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Highly suggest this product.
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have inflammation in my joints. I just feel better. And the machine has very good manners, it thanks you for using it!
customer_reviews.author: ErinR

customer_reviews.title: Water Ionizer of the Future & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the machine for 6 months now. It is worth the investment. Our family enjoys the refreshing taste of water as we use it for drinking and cooking. Initially, it ran a little slow but it works great now. I also really like their customer service as I had some questions about the filters. I called them and they promptly responded, addressed the issue to make sure I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It deserve 5 stars. It helped me to raise the blood pH in a short time. It gives up to 11.5 alkaline water. I noticed sleeping improvement.
customer_reviews.author: yahya

customer_reviews.title: Has voice, 2 large filters, tells PH and ORP and Filter life, sleek modern look
customer_reviews.text: Sleek modern design and digital screen tells you the PH and ORP of the water and your filter life. Has VOICE which I did not know about and has 2 large filters inside it. Very impressed with the features of this unit seems to be over engineered with top notch build quality.
customer_reviews.author: JMARS

customer_reviews.title: The Bawell machine is a great product and a great value
customer_reviews.text: The Bawell machine is a great product and a great value. I did my research prior to purchasing. The Bawell machine does more than other comparable machines at less than half the cost. The water taste great, provides energy, you can clean your clothes with it and wash your fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Rick O.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty diverter?
customer_reviews.text: When I try to run water through the diverter it will squirt all over. I have tried many times to re-attach it very tightly, but it keeps on leaking and squirting water all over. Any advise with this? I'm wondering after a few hours of attempts whether it can't just be that the diverter is faulty. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: TASTE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I buy this machine one year ago,definitely the best purchase i can make. 100% recommended,simple to installed and ready to use in 10 minutes. GREAT ALKALINE WATER PRODUCER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Javier M Marsico

customer_reviews.title: Love  it so much! It works like we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but it worse. Machine voice is very helpful but we don’t like Chinese accent. Would recommend to use Siri voice at least.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great system.......easy to install.....affordable.....and the health benefits are noticeable within 2 weeks time. Cheers to abundant health!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sopczak

customer_reviews.title: Become a water snob
customer_reviews.text: It’s expensive but worth it. Water tastes better from this thing. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great system that provides clean alkaline water
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product that works very smoothly and easy to set up. Very clean and clear and pure water that tastes wonderful. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dr.banuchi

customer_reviews.title: The machine is fantastic it does so many different things I don't think you could buy a better piece of equipment I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The machine is fantastic it does so many different things I don't think you could buy a better piece of equipment I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dabolt jr

customer_reviews.title: First one may have been defective, company replaced immediately.
customer_reviews.text: First one worked great for five days, and I think it had a glitch. Company replaced it immediately. Katoe
customer_reviews.author: Steve Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great priced
customer_reviews.text: Got this machine for 2 years and working very well. Love it. Great price. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Luc Vo T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! Easy to follow instructions and easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Salsbury

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for almost a year and are very happy with it. It's easy to set up and very easy to use. We have verified that the pH levels are accurate with a water test kit. We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to hookup under the sink and it sits on ...
customer_reviews.text: We were introduced to the machine while on vacation in Oregon. Ordered it when we got home. Received it in about 10 days. It was easy to hookup under the sink and it sits on the counter. It is amazing. I feel better, more energy. less stiffness. Looking forward to dropping a few pounds.
customer_reviews.author: mildred j shallahamer

customer_reviews.title: I have used my ionizer machine for a month now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used my ionizer machine for a month now. I have noticed that I sleep all night. I was had pain in my right arm because of arthritis/spurs (according to x-ray). . The pain is gone. My legs are stronger and I am now able to walk a complete mile a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Jean

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding- from packaging / installation instruction & materials to use (already feeling the positive effects!)
customer_reviews.text: The device was delivered as ordered, and included the full set of optional pre-filters and associated mounting/connecting hardware. I was very impressed with the quality of packaging and the clarity of installation instructions. Our unit is now installed and working beautifully! We love it. We are still only using the low alkalinity levels (per recommendations for the first week), but can already feel a difference in our energy levels! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: timautrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Health
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic unit....my family love it so much that we bought another one for our daughter. Now we have both units working and providing us the healthy alkaline water we need for our drinking and the acidic water for our external use. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: tonycua

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install. The machine talks to you and lets you know when the water is safe to drink and you can pick the levels of alkaline water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine was easy to install, was as advertised and best of all works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer, Sam 1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product, great buyer experience!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item was in a very good condition and it works great. Also faster shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Zeas

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like the shipping it was faster than I expected. Excellent works.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hang

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This machine shipped fast and was exactly what I wanted. Easy install! Great company to do business with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My water alkalizer was delivered in s timely fashion and was easy to assemble. It works exactly the way it was described. Quality is superb and look forward to buying more bawell products! Thank you Bawell for making an excuisite product!!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Unit had display normal and running good. I am very impressed to get alkaline ionizes ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this machine. I got a unit run after 15 minutes to install , water come out but got a display code ERR1 on filter 1! . And even I hit every level Ph @ ORP have nothing change . I sent message to customer let she/he know a problem . After many messages back and for, she/he help me to find out problem, because I connected a wrong way (from water out ===> unit out port). After I corrected a connection, so problems was solved . Unit had display normal and running good . I am very impressed to get alkaline ionizes water . Thank you She/he was very helpful .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fast fast delivery. Great product and great price. Willad ise allmy friends about to be sucked in to the KangenWater MLM scheme. Good value at $1495 vs. $3800 for Kangen machine.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Dossett

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in perfect condition and as advertised. Very clear instructions on how to set up the machine and easy to install. Appears to be very high-quality and meets all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: TY BURGESS

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent almost the entire day running back & forth to Lowe’s purchasing connectors to properly install this for it to only work for a total of 5 minutes!! After that .. it was nothing but error, error, ERROR “no water” ... um, my husband is a plumber - there was water being supplied to the device!! For $2k, work better!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Just as good as the $5000 ones people go on about. Filter usage percentage increases way to fast but I just ignore it as my water is good and I plan on changing them yearly since they want so much for them. Other than that, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: poor machine the machine will get burn if the water run more than 30 minus
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, couldn't produce ERW water as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this product due to it's lack of ability to create Alkaline water properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Howey

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bawell!
customer_reviews.text: Does what a water ionizer is supposed to do. Have a long list of things this baby helped us with but can't say anything, you know why. The only complaint, the acidic water doesn't go as low as Kangen (2.5). Otherwise, a superior machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, kinda big.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. Wish it wasn't so big. I like that it gives you 4 different alkaline settings. I've been learning about all the things u can use both alkaline and acidic water for. I will try and update after some time has passed.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service. They really stand by their lifetime warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: After using the filter for close to 2 years, the filter stopped working, I contacted BAWELL, they asked me to send back the filter to them, they repaired it and sent it back to me. They really stand by their lifetime warranty!!!
customer_reviews.author: RND

customer_reviews.title: Working as advertised. I almost sent it back before ...
customer_reviews.text: Working as advertised. I almost sent it back before I realized that the valve that goes on the sink spout was misaligned. The screw holding the selector lever was loose and allowed lever to become misaligned. I removed it and installed it properly. The water supply was then routed to the machine allowing it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good value if not pricey.  Lifetime warranty worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Working well and producing like we want it to produce. Has made a subtle difference in our health. Detoxing a longer process than anticipated. Tested with liquid and is very close to screen output both alkaline and acid. Easy to set up and cute voice reminding me to drink my water.
customer_reviews.author: eluthera

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Bawell but your employees needs better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Call was returned in a very timely manner. Within 10 minute. I was having problem with the swivel. It was leaking water. I got in contact with the company. The person that help me left a lot to be desired. Basically without saying he acted as if because Im a woman I didn't know what I was doing. Did I screw it on tight enough, did I use plumber tape, did I put the washer in correctly. The problem was resolved. What was needed was a second washer. Thank you Bawell but your employees needs better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Larreace

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of the alkaline water from my Platinum ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the alkaline water from my Platinum Alkaline Water Ionizer; the water has a silky smooth taste. I use an acid setting to clean all my fresh fruits and vegetables before eating them raw or cooking the vegetables. There is an enhanced quality to eating the fresh fruits and vegetables raw or the vegetables cooked. The control panel with voice reminders is very easy to use; and I appreciated the various hardware/fittings provided to cover a range of installation options.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install it. The water that I am drinking it's awesome. The taste is better the water I used to buy .
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good seller
customer_reviews.text: The experience with this seller was fantastic. Quick to reply to all my questions, and shipped out super quickly. The ionizer was quick and easy to install and easy to work and seems to be working well. My energy level is better as well as I believe I have lost weight since using. All in all I believe this ionizer is the best bang for buck out there.
customer_reviews.author: leanne brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Best alkalizing/ionization machine on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing! I'm so happy with my purchase. It was incredibly easy to install, and the display is completely user friendly. My water now tastes amazing, and I feel so much better knowing that I'm finally able to drink healthy alkaline water whenever I want. This is one of the best investments that I've made towards improving my health.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES KEEGAN

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the Bawell Water Ionizer machine for my Dad since we recently found out that he has cancer. I did a lot of research and realized the great health benefits of drinking PH water and keeping the PH water in your body at a certain level. We were able to setup the machine in about 15 minutes, it's easy to operate and the water tastes fantastic! Very happy with our purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: bawell Platinum Alkaline Water Ionizer Machine
feature_bullets: Bawell Water Ionizer Filter Systems Make Alkaline Ionized Water Benefits for drinking and Acidic Water
Alkaline Water Ionizer Filter Systems from Bawell feature a Forever Lifetime Warranty

Make alkaline and acidic water with PH Range 3.0 to 12.0 ORP Range +600 to -800 The Internal 2 Stage Water Filter System gives you cleaner more purified drinking water. Change the 2 filters every 5000 liters on average.

Displays PH & ORP , Filter 1 Lifespan & Filter 2 Lifespan & Alkaline Water or Acidic Water Electrolysis Settings. 110 Volts Only made for the United States and Canada only, does not work in Europe on 220 Volts.

This Alkaline Water Machine is only for the Countertop, it connects to the faucet or water line below the sink. To Make Alkaline Water Benefits the Water Ionizer requires minimum water pressure of 20lbs Per Square Inch of Constant water pressure (20psi) supplied by tap or well water pressure. Well water pressure that fluctuates or is not constant is unsuitable for use with this machine.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
